cast.name: 肖恩·麦克劳林 Sean McLoughlin

writer.name: 肖恩·麦克劳林 Sean McLoughlin

trans_title: 肖恩·麦克洛林：就这样吧
introduction: The world may be a strange and scary place, but life is still worth living says Sean McLoughlin. Sure, the west is collapsing, the corporations now control our every waking moment and the government may kick Sean’s wife out of the country any day. But life is still worth living, right?‘So Be It’ is the funniest, sharpest and (whisper it) most optimistic of Sean’s critically-acclaimed shows.
chinese_title: 肖恩·麦克洛林：就这样吧
